body:
https://k8s-gubernator.appspot.com/build/kubernetes-jenkins/logs/kubernetes-soak-continuous-e2e-gce/5756

```
/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/_output/dockerized/go/src/k8s.io/kubernetes/test/e2e/monitoring.go:43
Expected error:
    <*errors.errorString | 0xc820e0cfe0>: {
        s: "Error running &{/jenkins-master-data/jobs/kubernetes-soak-weekly-deploy-gce/workspace/kubernetes/platforms/linux/amd64/kubectl [kubectl --server=https://107.178.209.65 --kubeconfig=/var/lib/jenkins/jobs/kubernetes-soak-weekly-deploy-gce/workspace/.kube/config log heapster-v1.1.0.beta2-3396835968-n4cpw --namespace=kube-system] []  <nil>  Error from server: a container name must be specified for pod heapster-v1.1.0.beta2-3396835968-n4cpw, choose one of: [heapster eventer heapster-nanny eventer-nanny]\n [] <nil> 0xc821773b40 exit status 1 <nil> true [0xc8200faab8 0xc8200fa3a0 0xc8200fa410] [0xc8200faab8 0xc8200fa3a0 0xc8200fa410] [0xc8200fa398 0xc8200fa3f0] [0xa76130 0xa76130] 0xc82191f200}:\nCommand stdout:\n\nstderr:\nError from server: a container name must be specified for pod heapster-v1.1.0.beta2-3396835968-n4cpw, choose one of: [heapster eventer heapster-nanny eventer-nanny]\n\nerror:\nexit status 1\n",
    }
    Error running &{/jenkins-master-data/jobs/kubernetes-soak-weekly-deploy-gce/workspace/kubernetes/platforms/linux/amd64/kubectl [kubectl --server=https://107.178.209.65 --kubeconfig=/var/lib/jenkins/jobs/kubernetes-soak-weekly-deploy-gce/workspace/.kube/config log heapster-v1.1.0.beta2-3396835968-n4cpw --namespace=kube-system] []  <nil>  Error from server: a container name must be specified for pod heapster-v1.1.0.beta2-3396835968-n4cpw, choose one of: [heapster eventer heapster-nanny eventer-nanny]
     [] <nil> 0xc821773b40 exit status 1 <nil> true [0xc8200faab8 0xc8200fa3a0 0xc8200fa410] [0xc8200faab8 0xc8200fa3a0 0xc8200fa410] [0xc8200fa398 0xc8200fa3f0] [0xa76130 0xa76130] 0xc82191f200}:
    Command stdout:

    stderr:
    Error from server: a container name must be specified for pod heapster-v1.1.0.beta2-3396835968-n4cpw, choose one of: [heapster eventer heapster-nanny eventer-nanny]

    error:
    exit status 1

not to have occurred
```

It seems that when it takes a while, it tries to collect debug info. And that collection is flawed because kubectl needs a container for log collection when the pod has more than one container.
#27374

labels.description: Categorizes issue or PR as related to a flaky test.
labels.name: kind/flake

labels.description: Must be staffed and worked on either currently, or very soon, ideally in time for the next release.
labels.name: priority/important-soon

title: [k8s.io] Monitoring should verify monitoring pods and all cluster nodes are available on influxdb using heapster.
